function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Connectivity of medical tools and devices through the internet","Impact":"Exposure to cyber attacks and hacking of medical data","Mitigation":"Implementing strong cybersecurity measures and regular security updates","Technologies":"Encryption, firewalls, network segmentation","People":"Healthcare professionals, patients","Owner":"Healthcare institutions, IT professionals"},{"Description":"Accurate forecasting of virus","Impact":"Inaccurate forecasting can lead to ineffective control measures and resource allocation","Mitigation":"Improving data collection methods and utilizing advanced analytics tools","Technologies":"Predictive modeling, data analytics, machine learning","People":"Epidemiologists, public health officials","Owner":"Health agencies, research institutions"}]}
